mapper.insert: insert into refund_record (usr_id, refund_money, order_id, refund_reason, refund_status, refund_type, refund_time, trade_id) values (#{usrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{refundMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{refundReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{refundType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{refundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tradeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update refund_record set refund_money = #{refundMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, refund_reason = #{refundReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_status = #{refundStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, refund_type = #{refundType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, refund_time = #{refundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, trade_id = #{tradeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where usr_id = #{usrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select usr_id, refund_money, order_id, refund_reason, refund_status, refund_type, refund_time, trade_id from refund_record where usr_id = #{usrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select usr_id, refund_money, order_id, refund_reason, refund_status, refund_type, refund_time, trade_id from refund_record
